00020 #include "calvin_files/exception/test/ExceptionBaseTest.h"

00022 #include "calvin_files/exception/src/ExceptionBase.h"

00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00027 
00028 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ExceptionTest );
00029 
00030 void ExceptionTest::setUp()
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00034 void ExceptionTest::tearDown()
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 void ExceptionTest::testCreate()
00039 {
00040         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException* ex = new CalvinException();
00041 
00042         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex != NULL );
00043 
00044         delete ex;
00045         ex = NULL;
00046 
00047         ex = new CalvinException(L"Calvin",L"This is a CPPUnitTest",DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,1234);
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex != NULL );
00049         delete ex;
00050 
00051         std::wstring datetime = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00052         std::string file = __FILE__;
00053         u_int16_t line = (u_int16_t)__LINE__;
00054         u_int64_t code = 1234;
00055         std::wstring source = L"Calvin";
00056         std::wstring desc = L"This tests the throw";
00057 
00058         try
00059         {
00060                 CalvinException exception(source,desc,datetime,file,line,code);
00061                 throw exception;
00062         }
00063         catch(CalvinException& cex)
00064         {
00065                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.Source().compare(source) == 0);
00066                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.Description().compare(desc) == 0);
00067                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.TimeStamp().compare(datetime) == 0);
00068                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.ErrorCode() == code);
00069                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.LineNumber() == line);
00070                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.SourceFile().compare(file) == 0);
00071         }
00072 }
00073 void ExceptionTest::testToString()
00074 {
00075         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException ex;
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex.ToString().compare(L"Not implemented yet.") == 0 );
00077 }
